body_text: I actually prefer connects to be above components, but we actually don't do this anywhere else. We should stick to one convention or the other - my vote is for this one.
body: I actually prefer `connect`s to be above components, but we actually don't do this anywhere else. We should stick to one convention or the other - my vote is for this one.
